title: Thinker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to form an opinion about, choosing either negative/positive. Players will be informed that they were thought of by someone (this role is not specified), but not which opinion they received. If you form a new opinion about a player, the old one is replaced.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start with a neutral opinion of every Peasant and cannot change your opinion of them.

fields.name: Philosophy:
fields.value:
*(You win when these conditions are true at the end of the day)*
- At least 3 players you have positive opinions of are still alive.
- A player you had a negative opinion of has been hanged.
- No players who you've formed positive opinions about have died last night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4346
*He stroked his beard. It all meant something... but what? What did it mean? He wasn't sure. He laid in his washtub in the center of the town square, trying to make sense of somethings and nothings.*
